sentences.sContent: ...When the researchers repeated the laboratory experiment on the second and third nights they found the left hemisphere could not be stimulated in the same way during deep sleep...
...Researchers from Brown University found that a network in the left hemisphere of the brain “remained more active” than the network in the right side of the brain...
...shut down one hemisphere of the brain when they go to sleep...

trans.tranCn: 地球的半球； 大脑半球
trans.tranOther: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the  equator
